purpleculture_pinyin:
tuán
round; lump; ball; to roll into a ball; to gather; regiment; group; society; classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
круглый; кусок; мяч; свернуть в клубок; собирать; полк; группа; общество; классификатор на комок или мягкую массу: комок (из бумаги), клубок (из шерсти), облако (из дыма)

Ru_trainchinese:
tuán: (сущ/глаг) (воен.) полк, отряд; группа; шарообразный предмет; (сокр.) Коммунистический союз молодежи Китая; скатывать в шар
tuán: (графема/сч.слово) круглый; масса (напр., воздушная); пампушка из клейкой рисовой муки с начинкой; счетное слово для чего-л. в форме шарика
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A genie is isolated pent in inside a lamp from the troupe of people it serves.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "囗" to " special " sound. The original meaning is circle. "Said Wen": "Tuan, 圜 Ye. Cong 囗, dedicated voice." "Jade Chapter.囗部": "Tuan, reunion also." Such as "Mo Zi. The Second Classics: "Jian Tuan Jing Yi." Sun Yirang leisurely commentary: "If you say Jian Zheng Yuan, light will gather in one." By extension, it refers to round and spherical things. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Fu's "Relief of boredom": "Every time Yan Fang continued Zhu Ying's offering, the jade seat should be sad and white."

" Group " means gathering and gathering. Such as "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Yingzhao Guan Beihu Tianshou": "The spirit of the Yanglu group, the cold smoke from the yin valley." Tang Dezong "Purchasing Wu Shaocheng's edict": "The people where he lives can unite the scholars and seek out those who eliminate the owes and cut the Shaocheng. The reward is quasi-regular."

" Tuan " means to surround and linger. For example, Li He in the Tang Dynasty's "Ping Fengqu": "Tuanhui Liuqu hug the anointed orchids, throwing golden cicadas on the mirror." Yuan Dynasty Cao Wenhui's "Sushuiche Tianshe": "The lord's tuan sits on the bamboo stove and the old grandmother makes more tea Happy."

" Tuan " means guess and estimate. For example, Han Yu's "Nanshan" in the Tang Dynasty: "Thanks to the resignation test of the regiment, and I miss a lot of thoughts." Chao Yuanli of the Northern Song Dynasty, "Youth Tour": "Brows and eyes are still speechless, teach me how to live a regiment."

" Tuan " can be used as a quantifier. For example, Lu You in the Southern Song Dynasty "Sui Mu": "I am often lazy when I eat and dress, and I want to deal with a bunch of threads for whom." "He Daqing's Legacy Mandarin Duck Ze": "Jingzhen, Kong Zhao said that he has a serious criminal, and he is flustered and timid. The internal organs are like a mess, without a clue."

" Tuan " is also used as the establishment of the army. "Tongdian. Official Code: "Guardians consist of three hundred people in a regiment, and there are captains in the regiment; fifty people in a team, the team is upright; ten people are the fire, and the fire has the strength." "New Tang Book. "Hundred Officials": "Captain Zhechong is in charge of the subordinate Bisuwei, and the division is in charge of military equipment, resources, and training. A group of three hundred people will be led by a lieutenant."
humanum_short_description_en: From "囗" to " special " sound. The original meaning is circle.
humanum_full_description:
從「囗」，「專」聲。本義是圓。《說文》：「團，圜也。从囗，專聲。」《玉篇．囗部》：「團，團圓也。」如《墨子．經下》：「鑑團景一。」孫詒讓閒詁：「蓋謂鑑正圜則光聚於一。」引申泛指圓形、球形的東西。如唐代杜甫〈解悶〉：「 炎方每續朱櫻獻，玉座應悲白露團。」

　　「團」表示集合、聚集。如《文選．顏延年〈應詔觀北湖田收〉》：「陽陸團精氣，陰谷曳寒煙。」唐德宗〈討吳少誠詔〉：「其所在百姓，能團結士眾，討除梟斬少誠者，準例封賞。」

　　「團」表示環繞、縈繞。如唐代李賀〈屏風曲〉：「團迴六曲抱膏蘭，將鬟鏡上擲金蟬。」元代曹文晦〈宿水車田舍〉：「主翁團坐竹爐紅，老姥燒茶多喜色。」

　　「團」表示猜度、估計。如唐代韓愈〈南山〉：「團辭試提挈，掛一念萬漏。」北宋晁元禮〈少年游〉：「眉來眼去又無言，教我怎生團。」

　　「團」可作量詞。如南宋陸游〈歲暮〉：「啖飯著衣常苦懶，為誰欲理一團絲。」《醒世恒言．赫大卿遺鴛鴦則》：「靜真、空照自己罪犯已重，心慌膽怯，那五臟六腑，猶如一團亂麻，沒有個頭緒。」

　　「團」又用作軍隊的編制。《通典．職官典》：「衞士以三百人為團 ，團有校尉；五十人為隊，隊有正；十人為火，火有長。」《新唐書．百官志》：「折衝都尉掌領屬備宿衞，師役則總戎具、資糧、點習，以三百人為團，一校尉領之。」

tuan2
HSK 5: 團,团
團團RS
团团 		sphere, ball, circle, mass, lump, association
  • monopolizer 專 having a ring 囗 of people to serve him
  • ⓢ person surrounded 囗 a group of people: sphere or association
(Simplified: 团)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 尖
Ideographic: A lot of talent 專 gathered in one place 囗
  • ⿴ Full surround
    • 囗 [ wéi ] enclosure; border
    • 專 [ zhuān ] concentrated, specialized; to monopolize
①圓形：團扇。團臍。
②結成球形的東西：湯糰。飯糰。
③把東西揉成球形：團煤球。
④會合在一起：團聚。團圓。
⑤工作或活動的集體組織：團體。團伙。集團。
⑥軍隊的編制單位，營的上一級。
⑦舊時某些地區相當於鄉一級的政權機關：團練。團丁。
⑧量詞，用於成團的東西：一團槽。

團伙 [ tuán huǒ ]: (criminal) gang; gang member; accomplice; crony

Chinese: A troupe is a group of people whose specialty is dancing and are often pent in on a tour bus traveling around.
Meaning: troupe
Hanzi: 团
Story: A genie is isolated pent in inside a lamp from the troupe of people it serves.
Kind: traditional

從「 囗 」，「 專 」聲。本義是圓。《說文》：「團，圜也。从囗，專聲。」《玉篇．囗部》：「團，團圓也。」如《墨子．經下》：「鑑團景一。」孫詒讓閒詁：「蓋謂鑑正圜則光聚於一。」引申泛指圓形、球形的東西。如唐代杜甫〈解悶〉：「 炎方每續朱櫻獻，玉座應悲白露團。」 「 團 」表示集合、聚集。如《文選．顏延年〈應詔觀北湖田收〉》：「陽陸團精氣，陰谷曳寒煙。」唐德宗〈討吳少誠詔〉：「其所在百姓，能團結士眾，討除梟斬少誠者，準例封賞。」 「 團 」表示環繞、縈繞。如唐代李賀〈屏風曲〉：「團迴六曲抱膏蘭，將鬟鏡上擲金蟬。」元代曹文晦〈宿水車田舍〉：「主翁團坐竹爐紅，老姥燒茶多喜色。」 「 團 」表示猜度、估計。如唐代韓愈〈南山〉：「團辭試提挈，掛一念萬漏。」北宋晁元禮〈少年游〉：「眉來眼去又無言，教我怎生團。」 「 團 」可作量詞。如南宋陸游〈歲暮〉：「啖飯著衣常苦懶，為誰欲理一團絲。」《醒世恒言．赫大卿遺鴛鴦則》：「靜真、空照自己罪犯已重，心慌膽怯，那五臟六腑，猶如一團亂麻，沒有個頭緒。」 「 團 」又用作軍隊的編制。《通典．職官典》：「衞士以三百人為團 ，團有校尉；五十人為隊，隊有正；十人為火，火有長。」《新唐書．百官志》：「折衝都尉掌領屬備宿衞，師役則總戎具、資糧、點習，以三百人為團，一校尉領之。」

The Second Classics: "Jian Tuan Jing Yi." Sun Yirang leisurely commentary: "If you say Jian Zheng Yuan, light will gather in one." By extension, it refers to round and spherical things. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Fu's "Relief of boredom": "Every time Yan Fang continued Zhu Ying's offering, the jade seat should be sad and white." " Group" means gathering and gathering. Such as "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Yingzhao Guan Beihu Tianshou": "The spirit of the Yanglu group, the cold smoke from the yin valley." Tang Dezong "Purchasing Wu Shaocheng's edict": "The people where he lives can unite the scholars and seek out those who eliminate the owes and cut the Shaocheng. The reward is quasi-regular." " Tuan" means to surround and linger. For example, Li He in the Tang Dynasty's "Ping Fengqu": "Tuanhui Liuqu hug the anointed orchids, throwing golden cicadas on the mirror." Yuan Dynasty Cao Wenhui's "Sushuiche Tianshe": "The lord's tuan sits on the bamboo stove and the old grandmother makes more tea Happy." " Tuan" means guess and estimate. " Tuan" is also used as the establishment of the army. "Tongdian. Seal characters (1)

團字的基本解释

團
tuán
见“团”。

團字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuán］
［《廣韻》度官切，平桓，定。］
“团1”的繁体字。
(1)圆。
(2)米或粉等制成的球形食品。
(3)泛指球形或圆形的物品。
(4)分不开；聚合在一起。
(5)指聚合体。
(6)凝聚；凝结。
(7)聚集；组织。
(8)环绕；围绕。
(9)搓揉成球形。
(10)哄；笼络。
(11)猜度；估量。
(12)量词。
(13)军队编制单位。今团一级，一般隶属于师，下辖若干营。
(14)古代地方行政单位名。
(15)商店聚集的市场。
(16)青少年的政治性组织。在我国特指中国共产主义青年团。
(17)工作或活动的集体。

團字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　團； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页221第02
【唐韻】度官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徒官切，?音搏。【說文】圓也。【班婕妤詩】裁爲合歡扇，團團似明月。【張衡·思?賦】志團團以應懸兮，誠心固其如結。　又黃團，瓜蔞名。【韓愈·城南聯句】紅皺曬檐瓦，黃團繫門衡。　又通作摶。【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】小首而長，摶身而鴻。【註】摶徒丸反。圓也。　又通作專。【周禮·地官·大司徒】其民專而長。【註】專，圓也。徒丸反。【前漢·五行志】蜺再重赤而專。又【宋玉·九辯】意專專之不可化兮。卽團團也。　又通作敦。【詩·豳風】有敦瓜苦。【疏】蔓生專專然。音團。　又通作顓。【賈捐之棄珠崖議】顓顓獨居一海之中。【註】顓顓，圓貌。　又通作慱。【詩·檜風】勞心慱慱兮。【傳】言憂思團結不解。與團同。　又與园同。見园字註。　又【集韻】淳沿切，音輇。義同。亦作槫。　又豎兗切，音踹。與槫同。載柩車也。　又叶徒年切，音田。【白居易·悟眞寺詩】悠悠白雲過，決開露靑天。西北日落時，夕暉紅團團。

團字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
團字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
group
tuán
See "group".
group
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuán］
["Guangyun" Duguanqie, Pinghuan, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "团1".
(1) Round.
(2) Spherical food made of rice or flour.
(3) Generally refers to spherical or round objects.
(4) Inseparable; together.
(5) Refers to polymers.
(6) Coagulation; condensation.
(7) Gathering; organization.
(8) Surround; surround.
(9) Knead into a spherical shape.
(10) To coax; to win over.
(11) Guess; estimate.
(12) Quantifiers.
(13) Army establishment units. At the level of the regiment, it is generally subordinate to the division and has several battalions under its jurisdiction.
(14) The name of the ancient local administrative unit.
(15) A market where shops gather.
(16) Youth political organization. In our country, it refers specifically to the Chinese Communist Youth League.
(17) Work or activity group.
group

[Jia Yuanzhi Disposal of Pearl Cliff] Zhuan Zhuan lives alone in the sea. [Note] Zhuan Zhuan, round appearance.　It's all over again. 【Poetry·Hinofeng】Thanks to your heart. [Legend] Words, worries, unity and puzzled. Same as the group.　The same as the garden again. See Note to Garden.　 [Ji Yun] Chun cut along the edge, and the sound is different. The same meaning. Also known as 槫.　 It cuts vertically again, and the sound kicks. Same as Chu. Carrying the hearse too.　Ye Tu Nian cut again, Otoda. 【Bai Juyi·Wu Sui Temple Poetry】The white clouds pass by, and the sky will be revealed. At sunset in the northwest, the sunset is red.
